*div1 type="summary"* *p*Inquires about Texas. Conditions in Arkansas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Near Little Rock Arkansas Territory*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-20-1825">Oct. 20th. 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dr. Sir (friend and fellow Traveler)—*/p*
*p*I this *date_mentioned n="10-20-1825">evening */date_mentioned*meet with a *person_mentioned*stranger */person_mentioned*who tells me he is gowing to your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* and will be shure to see you, wherefore I imbrace the opportunity of writing to you, after so long a silence on my part as well as on your own, but with how much pleasure would I have received, and answered a Letter from you. I have been ever since I returned to the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* surveying for the *person_mentioned*Government*/person_mentioned*, and have just now finished a learge Dist of surveying in *person_mentioned*Crittenden*/person_mentioned*s perchase (or *location_mentioned*Guawpaw Country*/location_mentioned*) and will shortly be on my way to *location_mentioned*St. Louis*/location_mentioned* with my returns. I live at *location_mentioned*Helena County of Phillips A. T.*/location_mentioned* (where I have a *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned* and Two fine *person_mentioned*Boys*/person_mentioned*) And on my return I would be over rejoiced to receive a letter from you. Do write an inform me of the particular situation of your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—the production of the soil (from your observation) the prospects of improvement—Condition of the *person_mentioned*government */person_mentioned*etc. etc—You know what I wish to learn independent of my statements.*/p*
*p*I still have a strong desire to emegrate to the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, and upon your statements (if you will condesend to write) it depends. I am doing very well here, but notwithstanding I would rather be there.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*N. Rightor*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*Province of Texas Government of Mexico*/location_mentioned* Politeness of a *person_mentioned*Stranger*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
